scripts.preversion: if git diff --quiet HEAD; then echo "You have changes on your git, commit them and rerun npm version"; exit 0; fi
scripts.postversion: sed -i -e "1s/## Upcoming/## $npm_package_version/" CHANGELOG.md; git add CHANGELOG.md && git add package.json && git commit -m $npm_package_version && git push origin master && npm run git-publish && npm publish
scripts.git-publish: git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "Check CHANGELOG.md for further details" && git push origin --tags
